name: Hollyoaks: Mercedes & The Gloved Hand Killer
name_original: Hollyoaks: Mercedes & The Gloved Hand Killer
description:
The Hollyoaks match-3 game is BACK with even more puzzle-solving, a new killer plot... plus the one and only Mercedes McQueen!
 
With 40 additional levels and a mysterious storyline to complete, can you help Mercy escape the Gloved Hand Killer’s evil clutches before it’s too late? (Complete level 20 to unlock this new episode)
 
We’ve also made a bunch of improvements to this update, including daily rewards! And the eagle-eyed amongst you may spot one or two surprises along the way… well, this is Hollyoaks, after all!​

Featuring:
 - 140 addictive levels!
 - Exciting Match 3 Gameplay!
 - Bite size gameplay but plenty to play!
 - Unique Hollyoaks objects to discover!
 - Picture reveals of your favourite Hollyoaks characters.
 - Map of the village - “Previously On” recaps, just like the show
 - Unlock “Selfies” – so you can take and share photos of you with your fave Hollyoaks characters.
-Make friends, unlock new locations and get texts, pics and voicemail from your fave 'Oaksy characters.  

Breakfast with Sienna, jogging with Ziggy, searching for Jack’s lederhosen, and ghost-hunting with Tom... it’s all in a day’s work! But keep your wits about you, because not everything’s as it seems in the village. . With two episodes to choose between, will you manage to solve the mystery of Nana’s missing pearls and save Mercedes from the Gloved Hand Killer?
 
Please note – the game is free to play, however some items can also be purchased for real money, and there is no restriction on the amount of purchases that can be made. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
